HDFC Bank.offer description: Exclusive discounts at spas, salons, gyms | 2X weekend dining | Up to 50 days interest free credit | ₹9 lakh credit liability cover | 2% foreign currency markup | 12 lounge access | 1% fuel surcharge waiver | Welcome benefits including Amazon Prime, Swiggy One, MMT BLACK | Milestone benefits on spends of Rs. 40,000 | Annual spend based benefits | Renewal fee waiver on spending ₹3L | Smart EMI option | Contactless payment up to ₹5000 | Insurance cover up to ₹25 Lacs | Reward points on retail spends and SmartBuy | Buy One Get Free on BookMyShow | 5X rewards on Swiggy and Zomato | Complimentary annual memberships on achieving spends | Good Food Trail program with up to 20% savings on Swiggy Dineout

Diners Club.validity: 90 days from card issuance or last upgrade/downgrade date
Diners Club.offer description: Choose any one Rs. 1500 voucher from Marriott, Decathlon, Barbeque Nation, O2 Spa or Lakme Salon upon net spends of Rs. 1,50,000 or more in a calendar quarter. Voucher validity will be mentioned in the communication received on email.
Diners Club.t&c: Benefits unlocked within 48 hours of quarterly spends milestone. Voucher must be redeemed within 90 days from the end of the qualifying quarter.

Times Prime.validity: Will be mentioned in the Email received on downloading the Voucher
Times Prime.offer description: Annual membership. Download the app, enter voucher code while signing up, activate offers, and enjoy membership.
Times Prime.t&c: Membership starts from activation day. Voucher/code applicable once per user. Contact support@timesprime.com for redemption issues.

Swiggy.validity: Will be mentioned in the Email received on downloading the Voucher
Swiggy.offer description: Annual membership. Download Swiggy app, apply coupon code, and enjoy benefits like Rs 150 off on Dineout, free delivery on select restaurants, and extra 30% discount on food delivery.
Swiggy.t&c: Membership valid on 2 devices. Minimum order value applies for discounts. Exclusions apply for free delivery.

Marriott.validity: Will be mentioned in the Email received on downloading the Voucher
Marriott.offer description: Rs 1,500 voucher. Redeem through Club Marriott South Asia App at participating hotels for dining, stay, and spa.
Marriott.t&c: Voucher valid only in India. Not applicable on discounted rates. Exclusions apply for certain purchases.
